'''Mahshid''' is an open-world [[NPC]] located in [[Port Ormos]], [[Sumeru]]. She can be found by the shop across from [[Djafar Tavern]] talking with [[Matari]] during the day. Both can be found seated at Djafar Tavern during nighttime.
